in.ubee.api.ads

Class AdRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.ubee.api.ads.AdRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    in.ubee.api.models.JSONMapping.AdRequest, in.ubee.models.util.Jsonable, java.io.Serializable

    public final class AdRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements in.ubee.api.models.JSONMapping.AdRequest, in.ubee.models.util.Jsonable
    AdRequest utilized in the AdvertisementRequest Target. You may opt to save a default ad request that will be utilized in every request.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setRequestAgent

        public AdRequest setRequestAgent(java.lang.String requestAgent)
        Set the request agent string to identify the ad request's origin. Third party libraries that reference the InLocoMedia SDK should call this method to denote the platform from which the ad request originated. For example, if a third party ad network called "CoolAds network" mediates requests to the InLocoMedia SDK, it should call this method with "CoolAds".

      • getQuery

        public java.lang.String getQuery()
        Get the query to filter the AdRequest.
        Returns:
        the query

      • setQuery

        public AdRequest setQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Set the query to filter the AdRequest.

        Use the method setLocale(java.util.Locale) to set the language of the query string.

        Pay attention, it's a exclusionary filter. The AdView will be loaded only if there is ads related to the query.

        Parameters:
        query - the query to set
        See Also:
        setLocale(java.util.Locale)
